name: sunsteel-strike
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Other Pokémon’s abilities cannot activate in response to this move. In particular, it hits through disguise

flavor_text.sword_shield: The user slams into the target with the force of a meteor. This move can be used on the target regardless of its Abilities.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: The user slams into the target with the force of a meteor. This move can be used on the target regardless of its Abilities.
